text: The Rocky Horror Picture Show is a 1975 musical comedy horror movie by 20th Century Fox. It was produced by Lou Adler and Michael White and directed by Jim Sharman. It was written by Sharman and actor Richard O'Brien. The movie is based on the 1973 musical stage production The Rocky Horror Show. It stars Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon and Barry Bostwick and is narrated by Charles Gray. In 2005, The Rocky Horror Picture Show was selected by the United States National Film Registry. ==References== Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:British horror movies Category:British musical movies Category:1970s American musical movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1975 comedy-drama movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Exploitation movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:1975 LGBT movies Category:Cross- dressing in movies Category:Movies about cannibalism Category:Incest in movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies
title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
